caption.title: Changes in spring snow cover and soil moisture memory over central Eurasia for 1967–1990 and 1991–2015.
caption.p: ( A) Time series of the CESCF. The blue and red lines represent mean CESCF for 1967–1990 and 1991–2015, respectively. ( B) Seasonal evolution of CESCF during two periods. ( C) Correlation coefficients ( R) of monthly mean soil moisture with spring (March, April, and May) soil moisture averaged over central Eurasia for the periods 1967–1990 and 1991–2015. The gray dashed line denotes the R significant at 95% confidence level.
